005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011
012/**
013 * Provides a Java type adapter implementation for data types that are based on
014 * {@link ICustomJavaDataType}.
015 *
016 * @param <TYPE>
017 *          the Java type this adapter supports, which is based on
018 *          {@link ICustomJavaDataType}
019 * @param <ITEM_TYPE>
020 *          the Metapath item type associated with the adapter
021 */
022public abstract class AbstractCustomJavaDataTypeAdapter<
023    TYPE extends ICustomJavaDataType<
024        TYPE>,
025    ITEM_TYPE extends IAnyAtomicItem>
026    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<TYPE, ITEM_TYPE> {
027
028  /**
029   * Construct a new Java type adapter for the class based on
030   * {@link ICustomJavaDataType}.
031   *
032   * @param clazz
033   *          a data type class based on {@link ICustomJavaDataType}
034   */
035  public AbstractCustomJavaDataTypeAdapter(@NonNull Class<TYPE> clazz) {
036    super(clazz);
037  }
038
039  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
040  @Override
041  public TYPE copy(Object obj) {
042    // Datatype-based types are required to provide a copy method. Delegate to this
043    // method.
044    return ((TYPE) obj).copy();
045  }
046
047}
